email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding the crude oil shipment you inquired about. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for loading around October 20-25. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s, specifically $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the mid-40s, say $45.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $45.50 is a bit tight given current market conditions. How about we meet in the middle at $48.00 per metric ton? The laycan remains October 20-25, and I can confirm the vessel will be ready at the load port (Houston) by then. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.00 sounds reasonable. Let’s proceed with that. Can you confirm the demurrage terms? Also, please ensure the discharge port (Rotterdam) is ready to receive the cargo within the agreed laytime. Looking forward to the finalized details. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear we’re aligned on the freight rate. The demurrage rate is set at $25,000 per day, pro rata, payable in USD. I’ll send over the finalized charter party agreement shortly, including the laytime window of 72 hours. Let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The demurrage terms are acceptable. Please proceed with the charter party agreement, and let’s aim to finalize everything by end of day. Appreciate your help on this. Cheers, John
